# NumberFormatter.Behavior.default

**Case**

The number-formatter behavior set as the default for new instances. You can set the default formatter behavior with the class method [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NumberFormatter/setDefaultFormatterBehavior(_:)].

## Declaration

```swift
case `default`
```

## Constants

- **NumberFormatter.Behavior.behavior10_0**: The number-formatter behavior as it existed prior to macOS 10.4.
- **NumberFormatter.Behavior.behavior10_4**: The number-formatter behavior since macOS 10.4.
